Check if a Python object has an attribute

#### Description 

Check whether a Python object x has an attribute name.

#### Usage
<pre><code>
py_has_attr(x, name)
</code></pre>

#### Arguments
* x A python object.
* name The attribute to be accessed.

#### Value
TRUE if the object has the attribute name, and FALSE otherwise.
